source_setting.source: select persistent_assignee_id, type, name_first, name_last, organization, num_patents, num_inventors, lastknown_location_id, lastknown_city, lastknown_state, lastknown_country, lastknown_latitude, lastknown_longitude, first_seen_date, last_seen_date, years_active from elastic_staging.assignees order by persistent_assignee_id limit {limit} offset {offset};

assignee_years.source: select patent_year, num_patents , a.persistent_assignee_id as assignee_id from elastic_staging.assignee_years ay join (select assignee_id, persistent_assignee_id from elastic_staging.assignees order by persistent_assignee_id limit {limit} offset {offset}) a on a.assignee_id = ay.assignee_id
